name: math.real-set
description: Class to work with sets of real numbers.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-only && npm run check
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run coveralls
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --recursive && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Xavier Garcia Buils <xgbuils@gmail.com>
